query:
SELECT 
                p.id, p.name,
                COALESCE(SUM(si.quantity), 0.0) as "quantity!: f64",
                COALESCE(SUM(si.total), 0.0) as "total!: f64"
            FROM sale_items si
            JOIN products p ON p.id = si.product_id
            GROUP BY p.id
            ORDER BY quantity DESC
            LIMIT ?
